alert.note: Alert for Eastern Beaufort Sea Coast (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 23 at 11:28PM AKST until December 24 at 6:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM AKST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Blowing snow with low visibility expected. Winds gusting to 45 mph. Visibility one half mile or less at times. * WHERE...Eastern Beaufort Sea Coast. * WHEN...Until 6 PM AKST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...East winds 25 mph will increase to 35 mph with gusts to 45 by early Sunday morning and continue into Sunday afternoon. This will cause snow on the ground to blow, reducing visibility and causing ground blizzard type conditions at times. Winds are expected to decrease Sunday evening and visibility should improve then.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling, especially in open areas. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
